label: Wesener, Thomas.  2015. No millipede endemics north of the Alps? DNA-Barcoding reveals Glomeris malmivaga Verhoeff, 1912 as a synonym of G. ornata Koch, 1847  (Diplopoda, Glomerida, Glomeridae). Zootaxa 3999(4): 571–580.
